dataObject.content: The man behind a petition drive to recall a California state senator and physician pushing for tougher vaccine requirements was charged on Wednesday with assault after livestreaming himself shoving the lawmaker in a sidewalk confrontation in Sacramento.

annotationData.content: {"category":{"label":"Biased"},"rationale":"The man behind a petition drive to recall a California state senator and physician pushing for tougher vaccine requirements"}
